[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=662802][img]https://i.imgur.com/i36UAgI.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=#ffffff]Hack Forums Moving to a Bigger and Better Home[/color][/b]
Well, the time has come for Hack Forums to move to a new server. With software conflicts, among other issues, the new server should represent a series of improvements to the forum including upgraded RAM, server location and more.

The move is scheduled to take place in May and due to the sheer size of the data being migrated, is expected to "go offline for as long as 24 hours, possibly more".

[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#9999F1]Omniscient[/color][/b][/url] stated the following:
[quote]
Our old server is fine but there are some software conflicts from upgrades and other nasty issues which won't get resolved easily. I'm also moving away from FreeBSD to a Linux flavor (won't name it). As much as I love BSD it's getting less and less support and I continue having conflicts with packages. We need to stay current to avoid exploits and to ensure that any new features we add can be supported by the OS, such as Git and Docker. New server will be in EU too in a country with less restrictions about content but that doesn't mean HF policies will change. It's just less worrisome.
[/quote]

The [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5027774]last migration[/url] took place nearly three years ago on October 19, 2015.

[size=xx-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5829294]>>see thread[/url][/size]

[hr]

[b][color=#ffffff]Reported Posts Statistic is Back[/color][/b]
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#9999F1]Omniscient[/color][/b][/url] has announced that the previously implemented Reported Posts statistic has returned. Due to the ongoing hard work of [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=175033][b][color=#9999F1]Xerotic[/color][/b][/url], the plugin has been updated to ensure it is functioning correctly in light of our upgrade to MyBB.

Please note that reports prior to the upgrade have been pruned.
[quote='Omniscient' pid='57028670' dateline='1525053468']

The reports were pruned before the upgrade due to the incompatible changes to how MyBB did the reports. Unfortunate but that's how it is.
[/quote]

To view reported posts, simply navigate to a member's profile and find it in their forum information.
[img]https://cybercustom.com/uploads/images/wc9q5v.png[/img]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3322334][img]https://i.imgur.com/H5MRIbN.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]Fully Paralyzed Patients Regain Use of Hands[/color][/b] 
Six patients with life-changing spinal cord injuries were given back the use of their hands. To put this into perspective, at the beginning of this study three of the six patients were not able to move their fingers at all and none of them were able to operate a doorknob. After the eight scheduled sessions of both researcher guidance and spinal stimulation, their motor function saw vast improvements. One of the patients described the experience as such; “About midway through the sessions, I could open my bedroom door with my left hand for the first time since my injury and could open new water bottles, when previously someone else had to do this for me.” The best part about all of this is that the entire process is noninvasive. The researchers used electrodes placed on the skin to stimulate the nervous system. There is also a great video embedded in the source article that shows the patients' motor function before and after the therapy. [i][size=x-small][url=http://newsroom.ucla.edu/releases/noninvasive-spinal-stimulation-method-enables-paralyzed-people-to-regain-use-of-hands-study-finds]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Heavily Recyclable Polymer Exhibits Many Properties of Plastic[/color][/b] 
A group of chemists at Colorado State University has made a huge step towards what is necessary for our long-term sustainability on Earth, waste-free materials. Their work was continued off of a study conducted in 2015 which was almost the polymer we needed but was required to be kept in frigid environments to be useful. The new and improved polymer solves the main issue with the original generation. The team hopes to use this to create entirely green plastics to replace all the environmentally harmful plastics we are all currently using. [i][size=x-small][url=https://natsci.source.colostate.edu/infinitely-recyclable-polymer-shows-practical-properties-of-plastics/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]   [/color]

[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/lv4d7BY.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white]North Korea's Kim Jong-un pledges 'new history' with South Korea[/color][/b] 
On 27 April 2018, history has been made. Kim Jong-Un, the notorious North Korean dictator, has crossed into South Korean territory in an effort to spark a treaty with South Korean leader Moon Jae-in. The two met at the border where they shook hands in solidarity. Kim states that it is a ‘starting point “for peace,” once the initial conversation had commenced. This act has come just months after missile testing and rapid firing of North Korea’s “warlike rhetoric.” Though to the public eye North Korea’s intent seems pure by the advancements made during the summit, “many analysts remain skeptical about the North’s apparent enthusiasm for engagement,” which will likely be taken with a grain of salt with President Trump, if the two eventually did have a similar meeting. The summit consisted of several sessions, and after the ending of the first session, Kim “returned to the North in a heavily guarded black limousine,” where his bodyguards all jogged alongside his travel back. A significant event was that of the shoveling of soil on roots of the tree, which featured both leaders’ names. The overlying title read: ‘Planting peace and prosperity.’ One accomplishment that was finally ringed upon was the agreement on ending the Korean War that ultimately began in the early 1950s.  [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.bbc.com/news/world-asia-43914208]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

Update: After the closing of the aforementioned occurrence above, Kim Jong-Un has agreed to denuclearize all nuclear weapons on the Korean Peninsula.  [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.nbcnews.com/news/world/north-korea-s-kim-jong-un-crosses-border-historic-talks-n869276]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]U.S. keeps China, puts Canada on IP priority watch list[/color][/b] 
As of 27 April 2018, President Trump has placed Canada on the United States intellectual property watch list. On 22 March 2018, Trump signed an official memorandum on intellectual property tariffs that focused on high-tech goods, primarily targeting China. This was a result of the alleged ‘coercive technology transfer practices’ and ‘trade secret theft, rampant online piracy, and counterfeit manufacturing’ that China was indirectly overseeing and contributing to. Trump administration officials are due to travel to Beijing next week to discuss intellectual property policies, in efforts to appeal the costly tariffs President Trump has placed on the country’s import. Along with Friday’s briefing, came the unexpected announcement of moving Canada to the low-tier ‘Watch List,’ the same list that China has been placed. A United States Trade Representative official stated that this determination had been agreed upon because of ‘poor border enforcement,’ especially when counterfeit goods come into scope, along with “intellectual property protection for pharmaceuticals.” United States pharmaceutical companies have maintained their continuous grief for Canada and the import of their “generic versions of drugs” that the United States has long accepted.  [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-trade-ip/u-s-keeps-china-puts-canada-on-ip-priority-watch-list-idUSKBN1HY24J]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]      [/color]

[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/uVQrGNh.png[/img][/align]
[b][color=white]Wolfenstein 2 Release Date For Nintendo Switch Revealed[/color][/b] 
More and more titles that you would have never expected to be released on the Nintendo Switch are being announced every so often. Just like the Dark Souls remastered game was a surprise for some, you may be even more surprised when you hear that one of the latest releases of the Switch will be Wolfenstein 2. For the die-hard fans, this may not be so much new information as it has been known for a while that the game would be coming to the device. However, the information that was not known at the time was when exactly the game would be in stores. Bethesda gladly announced that you could get the game during the summer this June 29. Bethesda states that the game will be, "complete and uncensored." Panic Button will be responsible for bringing this game onto the Switch. Panic Button may be known for bringing DOOM to the Switch which is another release that is showing that the Switch can pretty much handle any game coming its way. When released, the game will be priced at $60. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/wolfenstein-2-release-date-for-nintendo-switch-rev/1100-6458455/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Halo Online Mod Creator, ElDewrito, Banned by Microsoft[/color][/b] 
If you have not heard about Halo Online, then it was a mod that did not really have that much publicity, but over the recent week became popular after the release of their 0.6 update. Halo Online allowed for PC gamers to come together and play a modded version of Halo for free on their computer. This brought back a lot of nostalgia for those that absolutely loved the Halo 3 game. Many people tweeted out and posted on the official Reddit of the mod of how it brought back memories from even way back to when they were in high school. The mod was created by a team called, ElDewrito. Sadly, ElDewrito was recently contacted by Microsoft, and the mod was eventually banned. 343 Industries, the devs, state that the ElDewrito team violated "Microsoft’s intellectual property." The game was originally supposed to be released on the Russian markets and was later abandoned after the initial beta in 2015. 343 do allow people to make fan creations of things, but when it comes to a replica version of a popular game, they simply will not allow it. 343 Tweeted out, "This point is important "As we look ahead, we’re very excited about the prospects of an official classic Halo experience making its way to PC and we hope to be able to partner with the ElDewrito team and broader mod and content creation community" https://t.co/KVJbH5PfJI". This hints to an official PC version of the game. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.pcgamer.com/microsoft-blocks-eldewrito-the-player-made-halo-online-mod/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Shadow of the Tomb Raider: Hands-On with Lara's next Adventure[/color][/b] 
With the advancement of technology, the beauty of the art that is showcased in these new releases are just absolutely fascinating. Using the screenshot tools featured on Steam and in-games themselves, players are able to capture outstanding moments like they were actually real. Far Cry 5 has unbelievable scenery, and the graphics of the latest Dad (God) of War game are phenomenal. With that being said, with the upcoming Tomb Raider game, we can definitely expect to see some out of this world graphics. This game will feature Lara Croft in South America where Lara Croft must save the world by stopping the apocalypse from occurring. Due to ancient Mayan artifacts having certain powers to destroy the world, Lara must find them and not only put an end to the world being destroyed, but the evil Trinity organization too. You will love this game if you love puzzle-solving games. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.techradar.com/news/shadow-of-the-tomb-raider-preview]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][img]https://i.imgur.com/q2F6BnS.png[/img][/align]
[b][color=white]Gundam Build Fighters A-R Manga Ends in May[/color][/b] 
In life, all good things usually come to an end. The Gundam Build Fighters A-R manga will be finishing up their last volumes this May. The very last issue of the manga will be released on May 26. Gundam Build Fighters A-R debuted in Jan. of 2016. It was the sequel to the Gundam Build Fighters A series. The anime adaptions of Gundam Fighters series had aired from Oct. 2013 to March 2014. It wasn't until last year that the blu-ray discs were released to the public in North America. In addition, for those that prefer streaming, you can also view the series on Crunchyroll. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2018-04-26/gundam-build-fighters-a-r-manga-ends-in-may/.130906]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Azoland Pictures to Screen New Aqours Concert in U.S., Canada[/color][/b] 
Alright, Tsundere, we get it, you like Love Live. Calm down now and actually write about something else that isn't about that series. Well, for those who absolutely adore the anime series, Love Live, just as much as Tsundere (which is very slim), then grab your glow sticks and grab your callout book as we prepare for the delayed viewings of the Hakodate Carnival hosted by Aqours and Saint Snow. The Hakodate Carnival event was a two-day concert in Hakodate, Hokkaido, Japan that showcased the young successors of µ's (muse), Aqours and their counterparts Saint Snow. This was no ordinary concert as instead of the traditional one where all the girls perform together; it was a concert of the sub-units. The sub-units in Love Live! Sunshine!! consist of: CYaRon! (Chika Takami, You Watanabe, and Ruby Kurosawa), AZALEA (Kanan Matsuura, Dia Kurosawa, and Hanamaru Kunikida), and Guilty Kiss (Riko Sakurauchi, Yoshiko Tsushima, and Mari Ohara.) For those outside of Japan, a list on the official Love Live JP website listed a bunch of dates that include various different locations around the world that are offering the delayed viewings of the concert. You can take a look at the list [url=https://i.imgur.com/fpXzzjC.jpg]here[/url]. In addition, check [url=http://www.lovelive-anime.jp/uranohoshi/worldwide/uc2.php]the official website[/url] to see which venues are showing the delayed viewings. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2018-04-27/azoland-pictures-to-screen-new-aqours-concert-in-u.s-canada/.130936]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Masamune-kun's Revenge Manga Ends in 3 Chapters[/color][/b] 
Being left with a cliffhanger is definitely no fun at all. Especially when the release of the next chapter takes forever to complete. If you are a person that likes to watch anime or read manga that is completed, rather than one that is ongoing, then those reading or planning on reading the manga, "Masamune-kun's Revenge" will no longer have to worry about those cliffhangers anymore. The manga will be releasing their final three chapters this August, and the copies of the manga will be shipped out in July. It is finally confirmed that the manga will only have 10 volumes. The anime adaption was completed before the manga was. Will there be a second season? No spoilers, but the anime definitely did leave us hanging, as did the manga. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2018-04-26/masamune-kun-revenge-manga-ends-in-3-chapters/.130814]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]YuruYuri Announces New OVA![/color][/b] 
"Ring Ring, Moshi Moshi. Hello, yes, Police? Arrest these lolicons here." YuruYuri is releasing a brand new OVA for those who ship the cute little middle school lesbian lovers. Yeah, that doesn't sound creepy at all for those who do not watch anime. Regardless, this is a huge announcement since the release of the anime which aired back in 2008. It has been over 10 years since the original release of the series! You can catch on [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tAgw7NQa-H4]YouTube[/url] the brand new teaser for the OVA. An event was held in Japan for those to meet the voice actresses: Mikami Shiori, Ootsubo Yuka, Tsuda Minami, and Ookubo Rumi The YuruYuri series ended in 2015 with three complete seasons. The name of the OVA has been given the name, "YuruYuri Ten." Sadly, not enough information is known on whether or not the OVA will be a live-casted style show or an all-out animated one as the pictures of the viewing all showcased the girls that voiced the characters. Most likely it will be the latter and be animated, but until more information is released, we will have to guess! [i][size=x-small][url=https://otakumode.com/news/5add93a16b8e77dd7f74ff06/YuruYuri-Announces-New-OVA!]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Fireworks Anime Film's English-Subtitled Teaser Trailer Streamed[/color][/b] 
Sadly the video linked to the stream was taken down off of YouTube and hopefully will be re-uploaded in the near future. Putting that aside, the anime film "Fireworks, Should We See it from the Side or the Bottom?" will be coming to the West on July third, fifth, and seventh. The film that will air in the United States will have English subtitles. The movie adapts a modern twist to the 1993 live-action drama that Shunji Iwai created. In 1993, "Fireworks, Should We See it from the Side or the Bottom" was premiered in August and was a 45-min drama. GKIDS describes the film, "Producer Genki Kawamura follows up his mega-hit your name. with another tale of star-crossed teenage lovers with a sci-fi fantasy twist. Shy Norimichi and fast-talking Yusuke, are goo-goo-eyed over the same elusive classmate, Nazuna. But Nazuna, unhappy over her mother's decision to remarry and leave their countryside town, plans to run away and has secretly chosen Norimichi to accompany her. When things don't go as planned, Norimichi discovers that a glowing multi-color ball found in the sea has the power to reset the clock and give them a second chance to be together. But each reset adds new complications and takes them farther and farther away from the real world - until they risk losing sight of reality altogether." Originally, the film was first released August of last year and on opening day over 170 million yen, which converts to around $1.56 million, was earned.
[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2018-04-26/fireworks-anime-film-english-subtitled-teaser-trailer-streamed/.130905]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]   [/color][/size][/font]
